confcost.model

Class SendMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • confcost.model.SendMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SendMode
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a mode to send data. The SendMode is defined by its' key exchange protocol its message exchange protocol, and the key and message length.
    Author:
    Marc Eichler
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:
        signature - The signature protocol or null
        encryption - The encryption
        keyExchange - The key exchange protocol or null
        keyLength - The key length in bit
        messageLength - The message length in bit
        iterations - The maximum number of iterations
        generateKeyEveryIteration - Whether or not a key should be generated every iteration (true), or at initialization (false)
